remarks: The vector addition (group) operation is associative.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvgcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvgcl.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvass $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G C ) = ( A G ( B G C ) ) ) $.
